Thu Dec 28 03:13:43 PM UTC 2023
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/bin
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libidn2-2.3.4/bin/idn2 /opt/bin/idn2
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/include
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libidn2-2.3.4/include/idn2.h /opt/include/idn2.h
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/lib
🐚 sudo install -d /opt/lib/pkgconfig
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libidn2-2.3.4/lib/libidn2.so /opt/lib/libidn2.so
🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libidn2-2.3.4/lib/libidn2.so.0 /opt/lib/libidn2.so.0

🐚 sudo ln -sf /opt/package/libidn2-2.3.4/lib/pkgconfig/libidn2.pc /opt/lib/pkgconfig/libidn2.pc
